item.title: fall-winter 2022-2023
item.dc:creator: Zach Stoebner
item.content:encoded: fall noble warrior Thisis, solemn and true &ndash; great autumn oak guardian on the river&rsquo;s vanishing edge hear his cry, a plea for esteem betrayal, reveals the flower of anger a true being Stillness in fall’s ancient air, Symmetry wheel grinds the autumn windstorm Beneath her feet looking out these big moments &ndash; seem so small breeze on skin &ndash; peace on surface water one long summer gasp out front white lake line murmurs, flowers whistle orphaned leaves dancing a war in overhead grass dots the orange sky winter unknown purpose - they search for so long in a cloudy sky hummingbird dodges, coursing standstill raindrops, please flip switch the spring!

item.title: winter 2021-2022
item.dc:creator: Zach Stoebner
item.description: immense freedom, relief, and growth in what felt like the coldest winter
item.content:encoded: ear wind of walking through plain of grass | overhead daddy fishing :: a Star in my lens before the falls city search for sex sounds and sin : morning cloud ahead The Mat is an Ontology for Yoga body aches under oppressive light of clear winter pupils burn as cold sun peers behind branches flock of days already far away still undone blue fields of teeming aura bestow: life peace found in a puff jacket &ndash; winter’s green alone in bed but not my own :: drunk head open heart pasted to the window one eye open zen numbness after my youth, cathartic hairy sex storm’s warmth after my abandon youth at winter’s end a cloudy sky : offering clarity never known feather wisps courting chirps at last :: only edges freeze

item.title: fall 2021
item.dc:creator: Zach Stoebner
item.content:encoded: fall numbing :: I feel nothing but feel the numbness nine friends bathing in the pool of fallen oak leaves flock of birds leaves in the wind shift in unison seventieth page the answer to my problem on an oak leaf hard stare my mind-body is zen autumn blows in different pretty shaped pink geranium in autumn twilight yellow maple blesses us all with autumn broken toe on my 24th birthday Autumn’s rebirth sometimes &ndash; it all just comes together in one house, for moving beings still autumn breeze my beginning ahead, gaze up my journey’s trail, behind my ends cornucopia : i love that word so much gradient from the autumn maple cone&rsquo;s tip holly&rsquo;s fruit infect leafless branches of a Yule tree

item.title: winter 2020-2021
item.dc:creator: Zach Stoebner
item.content:encoded: quiet and rainy windows are closed, but listen world solitude devotion &ndash; sun that invites you upon inspection seated on winter grass &ndash; computer juxtaposed for final studies this is a coup trump = white supremacy is domestic terrorism carbonation, sip the popping bubbles winter rainfall snow not sticking &ndash; a son honors his father claiming his mantle screen replays gaming loops before me day lost to clouds watching romances traces of myself in every lip’s furl surprise, my kidneys! who knows what occurs beneath skin tree in the wind just so happy to be here bright clouds, cold blue : dark window opened growth of epochs cold inspection for the cold veggie harvest &ndash; in warm clothes the repeat burglar saunters through those aisles again

item.title: fall-winter 2019-2020
item.dc:creator: Zach Stoebner
item.content:encoded: fall subjects follow as queen bows her head &ndash; almost winter&rsquo;s turn flock of ducks survey centennial waters sun bids the cold

item.title: fall-winter 2018-2019
item.dc:creator: Zach Stoebner
item.content:encoded: fall to her autumn means outside ball is everything grey room fits dying leaves, not how he feels winter before happened two fraternal hounds &ndash; dry yard grass no order in time&rsquo;s quanta next does not exist
